Megatron, =
Grimlock and Kup be coming out of the hole into the area 
outside the fortr=
ess?))

As Perceptor commanded, the base attempts to sink, closing oxygen 
=
intakes, weaponry ports as well as personnel doors to the outside. 
With a =
shudder that could be felt through the entire base, central 
consoles showe=
d it sinking into the heat and fire of the magma that 
surrounded it. 

> R=
odimus nodded absently as he set the CR chamber for
> complete repairs, "Ye=
ah, well I need for the chamber
> to do its job first." The door swung open=
, and Rodimus
> stepped inside and turned to face perceptor. "Until then,
>=
 I leave the defending of this base to you." 
>
> Rodimus smiled as the doo=
r swung shut, and he went 
> offline as the repairs began. 

As the door cl=
osed and Rodimus' optics went dark, alarm bells began 
to echo through the =
black fortress, as proximity sensors began to 
pick up Autobot energy signa=
tures as well as a Decepticon approaching 
from underground, along the same=
 path that Scorponok had taken during 
his approach to the tower. 

The sig=
nals are approaching fast!
